mapper.update: insert into user_circle(id, circle_id, user_id, manager_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{circleId}, #{userId}, #{managerId});
mapper.delete: delete from user_circle where user_id = #{userId} and circle_id = #{circleId}
mapper.select: select t1.`id` id, t1.`circle_name` circleName, t1.`intro` intro, t1.`manager_id` managerId, t1.`created_time` createdTime, t1.`tags` tags from circle t1, user_circle t2 where t1.id = t2.circle_id and t2.user_id = #{userId}
